name: Environaut\Checks\Configurator
short_desc: Basic check to ask the user for environment configuration settings.
long_desc:
Supported parameters are:
- "introduction": text to display before this check
- "question": text to ask user for a value
- "setting": name of setting variable
- "setting_group": group the configured setting belongs to (for export; defaults to "config")
- "choices": array of autocomplete values or choices for selection (depending on check configuration)
- "default": default value if none is given by the user
- "hidden": hidden question to user (e,g. for credentials)
- "allow_fallback": allow fallback to visible input if hidden input does not work
- "validator": class/method to use for validation of value - must return valid value or throw helpful exception
- "max_attempts": maximum attempts if validator is specified
- "confirm": simple yes/no confirmation question (only y/n are accepted answers)
- "select": select value from the list of choices

getDefaultGroupName.name: getDefaultGroupName
getDefaultGroupName.short_desc: Returns the default group name this check uses when none is specified.
getDefaultGroupName.hint_desc: default group name of the check

getDefaultSettingGroupName.name: getDefaultSettingGroupName
getDefaultSettingGroupName.short_desc: Returns the default group name this check uses for settings when none is specified.
getDefaultSettingGroupName.hint_desc: default group name of settings of this check

run.name: run
run.short_desc: Execute the check and add messages and settings to the result.
run.hint_desc: true if configuration could be added to the result; false otherwise

DEFAULT_SETTING_GROUP_NAME.name: DEFAULT_SETTING_GROUP_NAME
DEFAULT_SETTING_GROUP_NAME.short_desc: Default group of settings that this check stores in the result.

DEFAULT_CUSTOM_GROUP_NAME.name: DEFAULT_CUSTOM_GROUP_NAME
DEFAULT_CUSTOM_GROUP_NAME.short_desc: Default group name used in messages of the report.
DEFAULT_CUSTOM_GROUP_NAME.long_desc: By default also used as default setting group name if not customized.
